verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh, what a Friend
Who walks beside me
To hold my hand,
And safely guide me.
Safe in His arms,
He'll always hide me.
Oh, what a Friend, He is to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He knows the way,
My road is wending.
He sees around
My pathway's bending.
He'll take me through
When day is ending.
Oh, what a Friend, he is to me.
